new_account_page.instructions: This information will be shared with the people you invite to connect with you on VeilidChat.
new_account_page.name: Name

selection.message: Please select a language from the list
selection.title: Language Selection

home.missing_account_text: Account is missing, removing from list
home.invalid_account_text: Account is invalid, removing from list

send_invite_dialog.title: Send Contact Invite
send_invite_dialog.message_to_contact: Message to send with invitation (not encrypted)
send_invite_dialog.note_text: Contact invitations can be used by anyone. Make sure you send the invitation to your contact over a secure medium, and preferably use a password or pin to ensure that they are the only ones who can unlock the invitation and accept it.
send_invite_dialog.pin_description:
Choose a PIN to protect the contact invite.

This level of security is appropriate only for casual connections in public environments for 'shoulder surfing' protection.
send_invite_dialog.password_description:
Choose a strong password to protect the contact invite.

This level of security is appropriate when you must be sure the contact invitation is only accepted by its intended recipient. Share this password over a different medium than the invite itself.

invite_dialog.protected_with_pin: Contact invite is protected with a PIN
invite_dialog.protected_with_password: Contact invite is protected with a password

scan_invite_dialog.title: Scan Contact Invite
scan_invite_dialog.instructions: Position the contact invite QR code in the frame
scan_invite_dialog.scan_qr_here: Click here to scan a contact invite QR code:
scan_invite_dialog.paste_qr_here: Camera scanning is only available on mobile devices. You can copy a QR code image and paste it here:
scan_invite_dialog.not_an_image: Pasted data is not an image
scan_invite_dialog.permission_error: Capturing QR codes requires camera permisions. Allow camera permissions for VeilidChat in your settings.
